document_data.name: Angruin Myrvult
document_data.mainbody: '''Angruin Myrvult''' was a powerful [[Zhentarim]] [[wizard]] in [[High Dale]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]] Angruin was the commander-in-chief of a secret [[Zhent]] occupation army in High Dale; however [[Elminster Aumar]] and [[Sharantyr]] discovered the Zhent plot about the dale and started an insurrection against the Zhent and thanks also to the coming of the [[Time of Troubles]] the Zhent were defeated and Angruin died by a spell going crazy.
